sentences.en: a college in name only.
sentences.cn: 一所有名无实的学院。

sentences.en: a woman by the name of Smeeton.
sentences.cn: 名叫斯梅顿的女人。

sentences.en: ask for the street by name.
sentences.cn: 问去某某街怎么走。

sentences.en: Family values are suddenly the name of the game.
sentences.cn: 家庭价值观突然变得重要起来。

sentences.en: he began to question what had been done in his name.
sentences.cn: 他开始询问别人以他的名义做了什么。

sentences.en: he dared not go out for fear of encountering a bullet with his name on it.
sentences.cn: 他不敢外出，害怕被定点枪杀。

sentences.en: He didn't give his name, but the voice was unmistakable.
sentences.cn: 他没留下姓名，但是那个声音是绝不会错的。

sentences.en: He didn’t want to do anything to damage the good name of the company.
sentences.cn: 他不想做任何有损公司良好声誉的事。

sentences.en: He is called Mitch, because his name is Mitchell.
sentences.cn: 人们叫他米奇，因为他大名叫米切尔。

sentences.en: He took my name and address, scribbling it down in his notebook.
sentences.cn: 他要了我的姓名和地址，匆匆写在他的笔记本上。

sentences.en: He was not listed under his real name on the residents panel.
sentences.cn: 他未以真名在居民名册上登记。

sentences.en: Her name is Mandy Wilson.
sentences.cn: 她的名字是曼迪•威尔逊。

sentences.en: His name has cropped up at every selection meeting this season.
sentences.cn: 他的名字突然出现在这一季所有选举会议上。

sentences.en: if you're convinced my staff are part of this operation, then name names.
sentences.cn: 如果你确信我的员工参与了这个行动，请说出名字。

sentences.en: It was an actor whose name escapes me for the moment.
sentences.cn: 那个男演员的名字我一时想不起来了。

sentences.en: Jimmy hadn't a bean to his name.
sentences.cn: 吉米什么值钱的东西都没有。

sentences.en: Pickled cucumbers, jam, pickled berries, tomatoes; you name it, they've got it.
sentences.cn: 酸黄瓜、果酱、腌浆果、西红柿，凡是你说得出的，他们都有。

sentences.en: She strove to read the name on the stone pillar.
sentences.cn: 她费劲地读着石柱上的名字。

sentences.en: the company's founder, Henry Ford, gave his name to Fordism.
sentences.cn: 福特公司的创始人亨利•福特创立了福特主义。

sentences.en: The dog's ears flattened slightly as Cook spoke his name.
sentences.cn: 库克叫这只狗的名字时，它的耳朵就会稍稍耷拉一下。

sentences.en: The house is in my husband’s name.
sentences.cn: 房子归于我丈夫名下。

sentences.en: the house was in her name.
sentences.cn: 这所房子登记在她的名下。

sentences.en: The name of your nearest stockist is available from the company.
sentences.cn: 从公司可以查到离你最近的零售商的名字。

sentences.en: The two murder victims have yet to be named.
sentences.cn: 两名凶案受害者的姓名有待确认。

sentences.en: The two were said to have been on first-name terms.
sentences.cn: 据说这两人关系很熟。

sentences.en: these polytechnics had been universities in all but name for many years.
sentences.cn: 许多年来，这些理工专科学校除了没有名分，与大学无甚差别。

sentences.en: They also left a card, imprinted with the name Sean Lynch.
sentences.cn: 他们还留下了一张名片，上面印着肖恩·林奇的名字。

sentences.en: They’re a lot better than some airlines I could name.
sentences.cn: 他们比我叫得上名字的一些航空公司要好得多。

sentences.en: This guy, Jack Smith, does he go by the name of Jackal?
sentences.cn: 这个叫杰克·史密斯的家伙是不是还有个名字叫杰凯尔？

sentences.en: We delved through a sackful of letters to draw the winning name.
sentences.cn: 我们把手探进一袋信件中抽取获奖者。

sentences.en: We named our daughter Sarah.
sentences.cn: 我们给女儿取名为萨拉。

sentences.en: What’s the name of the street?
sentences.cn: 那条街叫什么名字？

sentences.en: What’s your name?
sentences.cn: 你叫什么名字？

words.tran_cn: 命名的；指定的；被指名的
不可名状的，难以形容的；匿名的
命名；任命（name的过去分词）；称呼
命名，任命；指定；称呼；提名；叫出

phrases.tran_cn: 公司名称；注册之公司名称
名，西方人名的第一个字
发明（或发现、创建）以自己名字命名的事物
没有名分；未获正式承认
指名道姓（尤指说出做错事或违法者）
叫…名字的，名叫…的；以…的名义

phrases.phrase: something has someone's name on it
phrases.tran_cn: （某物）注定要被（某人）得到（或遭遇）

trans.tran_cn: 给…取名，叫出…的名称，确定，提名
trans.tran_en: to say what the name of someone or something is, especially officially
